T5.Animation

The T5.Animation module implements Robert Penner's easing equations and also includes functionality for implementing tweening values and object properties through particular functions and classes.

Module Functions

  • T5.Animation.tweenValue
  • T5.Animation.tween
  • T5.Animation.tweenVector
  • T5.Animation.cancel

Classes

  • T5.Animation.Tween
